[ti:Too Comfortable (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Too Comfortable (Explicit) - Future
[00:01.08]Lyrics by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Joshua Luellen
[00:02.16]Composed by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Joshua Luellen
[00:03.24]Better not get too comfortable
[00:07.86]B***h don't get too comfortable
[00:10.62]Better not get too comfortable
[00:15.29]B***h don't get too comfortable
[00:17.97]Better not get too comfortable
[00:22.78]B***h don't get too comfortable
[00:25.33]Better not get too comfortable
[00:30.08]B***h don't get too comfortable
[00:32.85]Better not get too comfortable
[00:37.50]Four or five h*es stuff 'em in a Lamborghini yeah
[00:41.12]Swapped out of public housing go and get a genie
[00:42.98]Three four stacks on a chinchilla beanie
[00:44.56]Got a cup full of mud and I'm draped in Celine yeah
[00:48.29]Can't think for yourself gotta think for the team yeah
[00:52.10]F**k me like a star gotta treat me like a king yeah
[00:55.58]Gotta roll with a chopper with a certain amount of bling yeah
[00:59.54]B***h don't get too comfortable
[01:02.37]Better not get too comfortable
[01:06.43]Yeah swerve in a bulletproof coupe yeah
[01:08.71]If I got to I'll shoot out the roof yeah
[01:10.76]Turbo 63 shawty look blackanese
[01:14.14]I keep it a G Louis V
[01:16.13]Came with a duffle bag full of mulah
[01:18.00]I put the fragrance on you Pucci
[01:19.85]Got my attention stay exclusive
[01:21.69]Put her in the Rolls Royce and Givenchy
[01:23.41]It's hard to stay sober when I'm spinnin'
[01:25.24]It's hard to stay faithful when you winnin'
[01:27.28]Showin' you're grateful and independent
[01:29.06]F**k all the danger
[01:30.78]Spray all the strangers you get too close
[01:32.69]I said three hundred but the Range really four
[01:34.48]You talkin' back to me I'ma cut your throat
[01:36.49]B***h don't get too comfortable
[01:39.27]Better not get too comfortable
[01:41.98]Better not get too comfortable yeah
[01:43.86]B***h don't get too comfortable
[01:46.82]Better not get too comfortable
[01:49.35]Better not get too comfortable
[01:51.17]Four or five h*es stuff 'em in a Lamborghini yeah
[01:54.95]Swapped out of public housing go and get a genie
[01:56.78]Three four stacks on a chinchilla beanie
[01:58.36]Got a cup full of mud and I'm draped in Celine yeah
[02:02.15]Can't think for yourself gotta think for the team
[02:05.96]I'm thinkin' colossal
[02:06.86]I'm thinkin' 'bout flyin' the vibes out goin' tropical
[02:09.61]I know I'm impeccable
[02:10.72]Seen what these n***as can do when that s**t get federal
[02:13.44]Caught in between eatin' up a queen
[02:15.23]Eatin' up a bean like vegetables
[02:17.07]Step out on the scene livin' like a king
[02:18.97]I know this game can be treacherous
[02:20.74]They was thinkin' that it couldn't be done
[02:22.41]And now it's tangible
[02:23.98]Tell me how you get this comfortable
[02:25.54]You're wearin' a wild animal
[02:28.15]Simply did it because they said it couldn't be done
[02:30.25]Then I went beyond
[02:31.76]Can't even pay for my son
[02:33.18]He on probation they revoked his bond yeah
[02:35.69]Gotta light another blunt yeah
[02:37.33]I'm not a publicity stunt yeah
[02:39.16]I done been through more s**t this month
[02:40.81]Than a n***a been through in a lifetime
[02:43.44]Cut a few n***as and b***hes off
[02:45.14]They was just wastin' my time
[02:46.74]Pretty and fine the way this girl designed
[02:48.68]I hope she can read my mind
[02:50.33]B***h don't get too comfortable
[02:53.12]Better not get too comfortable
[02:55.88]Better not get too comfortable yeah
[02:57.83]B***h don't get too comfortable
[03:00.47]Better not get too comfortable
[03:03.23]Better not get too comfortable
[03:04.97]Four or five h*es stuff 'em in a Lamborghini yeah

[03:10.60]Three four stacks on a chinchilla beanie
[03:12.26]Got a cup full of mud and I'm draped in Celine yeah
[03:15.94]Can't think for yourself gotta think for the team
[03:19.87]B***h don't get too comfortable
[03:22.62]Better not get too comfortable
[03:25.58]Better not get too comfortable yeah
[03:27.29]B***h don't get too comfortable
[03:29.98]Better not get too comfortable

data.trans:
[ti:Too Comfortable (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:High Off Life (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.08]//
[00:02.16]//
[00:03.24]最好不要太放松
[00:07.86]碧池 不要太放松
[00:10.62]最好不要太放松
[00:15.29]碧池 不要太放松
[00:17.97]最好不要太放松
[00:22.78]碧池 不要太放松
[00:25.33]最好不要太放松
[00:30.08]碧池 不要太放松
[00:32.85]最好不要太放松
[00:37.50]四五个小妞 把她们塞进一辆兰博基尼里
[00:41.12]逃离了公共住房 我要去找个许愿小精灵
[00:42.98]三四千块买一顶毛丝鼠皮的帽子
[00:44.56]杯子里装满了好东西 我穿了一身的Celine
[00:48.29]不能只为自己考虑 得考虑整个团队的事情
[00:52.10]像个明星一样和我亲热 必须把我当做国王一样对待
[00:55.58]必须随时带着武器 还有一定数量的金银珠宝
[00:59.54]碧池 不要太放松
[01:02.37]最好不要太放松
[01:06.43]开着防弹跑车狂飙
[01:08.71]要是逼不得已 我会从车顶探出来开枪打人
[01:10.76]涡轮增压 姑娘看起来是个混血儿
[01:14.14]我始终保持匪帮风范 穿上路易·威登
[01:16.13]带着装满钞票的行李袋而来
[01:18.00]我会给你买高级香水 Pucci
[01:19.85]引起了我的注意 就要对我专一
[01:21.69]让她穿上纪梵希 坐上我的劳斯莱斯
[01:23.41]当我过着风光日子时 真的很难保持清醒
[01:25.24]当你有钱有势的时候 真的很难忠贞不二
[01:27.28]告诉我 你心怀感激 个性独立
[01:29.06]管他什么危险
[01:30.78]所有靠太近的陌生人都会被干掉
[01:32.69]我说三十万 但这辆揽胜实际上要四十万
[01:34.48]你要是跟我顶嘴 我就割破你的喉咙
[01:36.49]碧池 不要太放松
[01:39.27]最好不要太放松
[01:41.98]最好不要太放松
[01:43.86]碧池 不要太放松
[01:46.82]最好不要太放松
[01:49.35]最好不要太放松
[01:51.17]四五个小妞 把她们塞进一辆兰博基尼里
[01:54.95]逃离了公共住房 我要去找个许愿小精灵
[01:56.78]三四千块买一顶毛丝鼠皮的帽子
[01:58.36]杯子里装满了好东西 我穿了一身的Celine
[02:02.15]不能只为自己考虑 得考虑整个团队的事情
[02:05.96]我的格局很大
[02:06.86]我打算把心情都释放出来 热闹一下
[02:09.61]我知道我完美无瑕
[02:10.72]我知道这些家伙面临警察的时候会做什么
[02:13.44]被夹在中间 好好伺候这女人
[02:15.23]来一点那种东西 体会一下兴奋的感觉
[02:17.07]离开这个地方 过着国王一样的日子
[02:18.97]我知道这行业里充满了背信弃义的人
[02:20.74]他们当时觉得我不会有成就
[02:22.41]如今事实摆在眼前
[02:23.98]告诉我 你怎么会这样轻松
[02:25.54]你披着一身兽皮
[02:28.15]之所以成功 就是因为他们说我做不到
[02:30.25]结果我大有成就
[02:31.76]想花钱救我儿子都不行
[02:33.18]他在缓刑期 他们拒绝了他的保释金
[02:35.69]得再点一根烟
[02:37.33]我不是在作秀
[02:39.16]这个月我经历的事情
[02:40.81]比某些人一辈子经历的都多
[02:43.44]和一些男人女人断绝了关系
[02:45.14]他们不过是在浪费我的时间
[02:46.74]这个姑娘的样子真的挺好看
[02:48.68]我希望她能读懂我的心
[02:50.33]碧池 不要太放松
[02:53.12]最好不要太放松
[02:55.88]最好不要太放松
[02:57.83]碧池 不要太放松
[03:00.47]最好不要太放松
[03:03.23]最好不要太放松
